name: IIN
description: IIN is a mysterious yet calming experience that soothes your soul and challenges your mind in a minimalist physics-driven puzzle world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any quadcore processor Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: On-board graphics set as "performance" Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or 10 Processor: Core i5 or i7 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Any off-board graphics Storage: 200 MB available space
